summary:
A crappy re-skin of some fine clothes and (almost) every shout changed to \"HO HO HOO!\"
Save-file included if you just want to start punishing the naughty ones right away.

The sound effect is a free audio clip from SFXsource.com and I have the right to use it for non-commercial purposes as far as I know.
descriptionHtml:
A crappy re-skin of some fine clothes and (almost) every shout changed to \"HO HO HOO!\"
Save-file included if you just want to start punishing the naughty ones right away.

The sound effect is a free audio clip from SFXsource.com and I have the right to use it for non-commercial purposes as far as I know.



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It\'s not really a high quality mod, but christmas is coming up so I thought \"Why not?\"

Also if someone would make a little video of your santa doing funny stuff that would be the best christmas present I could ask for!
author: Psientist
